articles.description: Great Britain's Ellie Aldridge claims gold in the sailing's women's kite final at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris Olympics sailing: GB's Ellie Aldridge wins gold in sailing's women's kite final

articles.description: Great Britain's Emma Finucane takes bronze in the women's keirin to win her second medal of the Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics cycling: Team GB's Emma Finucane take keirin bronze at Paris 2024

articles.description: Jade Jones loses in the first round of the taekwondo but Katarina Johnson-Thompson makes an excellent to her heptathlon campaign at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Top five stories from day 13 of the 2024 Games

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Follow updates of Kilmarnock v Tromso and St Mirren v Brann in the Conference League qualifiers.
articles.title: Kilmarnock v Tromso & St Mirren v Brann: Conference League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Britain's Jade Jones falls to another Olympic taekwondo defeat as she is beaten by Miljana Reljkik in the -57kg first round in Paris.
articles.title: Olympics taekwondo: Jade Jones beaten in first round of taekwondo women's -57kg

articles.description: Brazil striker Richarlison says he wants to remain at Tottenham next season despite an offer from a club in Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Richarlison: Tottenham striker rejects move to Saudi Arabia

articles.description: Jack Laugher and Jordan Houlden miss out on medals in the 3m springboard final as China continue their diving dominance in Paris.
articles.title: Olympic diving: Jack Laugher and Jordan Houlden miss out on medals

articles.description: The woman who complained about Christian Horner's behaviour has her appeal against the investigation that cleared him dismissed.
articles.title: Christian Horner: Red Bull employee fails in appeal against verdict that cleared boss
